description: Defer non-critical data loading and implement code splitting for route bundles
steps: Use React.lazy() for dashboard tabs (Quality, Activity, Discovery) that aren't visible by default in AnalyticsDashboard
Defer analytics data fetching for non-active tabs using conditional useQuery enables
Split recommendation-heavy routes (dashboard/recommendations, library/search) into separate bundles
Use dynamic imports for heavy charting libraries (recharts) only when analytics/recommendations are active
Implement route-based code splitting in TanStack Router to lazy-load feature routes
